text: Stefan Luchian () is a 1981 Romanian biographical drama movie directed by Nicolae Mărgineanu and starring Ion Caramitru, George Constantin, Maria Ploae, Ovidiu Schumacher, Monica Ghiuță, Victor Rebengiuc, Petre Gheorghiu, Adrian Rățoi. It was distributed by Româniafilm. == Other websites == * Category:1981 drama movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:Romanian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Nicolae Mărgineanu
title: Stefan Luchian (movie)
